title: Bojary, Lublin Voivodeship
text:
Bojary is a <a href="village">village</a> in the administrative district of <a href="Gmina%20Podedw%C3%B3rze">Gmina Podedwórze</a>, within <a href="Parczew%20County">Parczew County</a>, <a href="Lublin%20Voivodeship">Lublin Voivodeship</a>, in eastern Poland. It lies approximately east of <a href="Podedw%C3%B3rze">Podedwórze</a>, east of <a href="Parczew">Parczew</a>, and north-east of the regional capital <a href="Lublin">Lublin</a>.
The village has an approximate population of 30.
References.
